description:
Do you ever want to know a little more about a beer before you order it from a bar? Maybe you would like to tell the world how good, or bad, the beer you just finished was? #Beer List (for TouchPad) is a front-end to a web-based database of beer tasting notes categorized by Country, Beer Type and Brewer, which has been designed especially for the HP TouchPad. The scrolling lists allow the selection of an individual Country, Beer Type and/or Brewer. The beers can be displayed with tasting notes, including voting links, so you can add your own rating to the database.

Note that although the app does not require a 3G/4G connection, at least a WiFi connection is needed to connect to the beer database server.
versionNote: 2.0.0: Updated for new Linux server. 1.8.0: Removed compatibility with webOS <3.0.0. 1.6.0: (1) Moved beer database server. (2) Added spinners to action buttons. 1.5.0: (1) Compatibility update to allow full screen display on HP Touchpad. (2) Expanded error message to include "Unable to access beer database server". 1.0.0: (1) Reorganised selection lists and counters. (2) Added beer name and brewer search.
